section.heading: General.
section.text: The Board shall provide a copy of this chapter:

para.text: Along with any application form or renewal form; and
To any other person upon request.

section.heading: Fee Schedule.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board for items and services provided under this subtitle:

para.text: License renewal fee due on or before October 31 of the renewal year ... $250;
Reinstatement fee due in addition to renewal fee submitted after October 31 of the renewal year ... $300;
Late fee for failure to notify the Board within 30 days of change of address ... $50.

section.heading: Change of Fees.
section.text: Fees are subject to change by action of the Board of Dietetic Practice. Licensees and applicants shall be notified of the change.

section.heading: Assessment for Health Care Professionals.
section.text: The Health Care Access and Cost Commission (HCACC) assesses a fee for health care professionals which the applicant shall pay at the time of license renewal as specified in COMAR 10.25.02.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§5-205, 5-206, 5-303, and 5-308, Annotated Code of Maryland
